public class CreateVertexModeEvtHandler
extends edu.umd.cs.piccolo.event.PBasicInputEventHandler

Recall behavior, from QGraphEditorJFrame: o To create a vertex: Click on the background (creates vertex in query) or on a subquery (creates vertex in subquery). Cursor: Shows a cross-hair cursor before the click. Highlight: None. Rubber-band: None.
